focusItem.failureMode: Leakage above spec at end-of-line test

categories.name: Method (Process)
items: Cleaning step skipped under time pressure

categories.name: Material
items: Surface finish out of spec on mating part

fiveWhys.text: Why is leakage above spec? → Seal not seated correctly.
Why not seated correctly? → Seal orientation occasionally reversed.
Why reversed? → No visual cue / poka-yoke in assembly step.
Why no poka-yoke? → Design did not include asymmetric feature.
Why not included? → Requirement for assembly error-proofing not captured.

assistant.welcome: I can help generate a fishbone, expand 5-Whys, and translate outcomes into DFMEA actions + controls.
suggestedPrompts: Turn the 5-Whys into DFMEA recommended actions.
Suggest detection and prevention controls for seal orientation.
What verification tests prove the corrective action worked?
